system.description:
A dragon is a reptilelike creature, usually winged, with magical or unusual abilities.

Features: 12-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to total Hit Dice (as fighter); good Fortitude, Reflex, and Will saves; skill points (6 + Int modifier) per Hit Die.

Traits: Dragons eat, sleep, and breathe; proficient with natural weapons only (unless humanoid in form); immunity to magic sleep and paralysis; darkvision 60 ft. and low-light vision.
